DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate clinical benefit novel sleep-focused mind-body program Gulf War Illness ( GWI ) symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Benefits Novel Sleep-focused Mind-body Program Gulf War Illness ( GWI ) Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study investigate whether two treatment condition : Mind-Body Bridging ( MBB ) Supportive Education ( SED ) effective improve sleep disturbance self-reported indicator co-morbid symptom veteran GWI . The two treatment condition comprise 3 session 2 hr . duration conduct 3 consecutive week ( Week 1-3 ) .
DOC.criteria: Veteran First Gulf War Suffering sleep disturbance Has chronic symptom Gulf War Illness : fatigue chronic headache joint/muscle pain cognitive difficulty memory/concentration problem shortness breath gastrointestinal symptom terminally ill highly unstable medical psychiatric condition Parkinson disease dementia cause Nocturia delayed/advanced sleep phase syndrome Narcolepsy
